A4.text: Paramount announced in March 2023 that the fifth season of Star Trek: Discovery would be the last for the series.

A5.text: The fifth season of Star Trek: Discovery was released on October 18, 2024.

A6.text: The fifth season of Star Trek: Lower Decks was released from October to December 2024 and is the last season of the series.

A7.text: Paramount confirmed in April 2024 that the fifth season of Star Trek: Lower Decks would be the last for the series.

A8.text: Star Trek: Scouts premiered on September 8, 2025.

A9.text: A fifth and final season of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds was announced in June 2025, with filming taking place from September to December 2025.

A10.text: The fourth season of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds is expected to be released in 2026.

A12.text: In June 2025, Netflix decided to let the license for the series expire.

A13.text: The hiatus that followed the cancellation of Star Trek: Enterprise lasted until the launch of Star Trek: Discovery in 2017.
